post.title: Surnames Navigator
post.subtitle: Navigating Surnames Across the World
post.excerpt: A meta-post to ease navigation in surnames shown through wordcloud visualizations...
post.citation: Project 'Surnames Navigator' (2024), Vitaliy Y from Witold's Data Consulting

content.text: This meta-post navigates surnames across world regions using wordcloud visualizations. Data from Forebears.io: https://forebears.io.
